ygData.subject: Re: Bard Superstitions?
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe my macro is Help! kill it! kill it! HELP!!! its the number 2 spot in my first hot-ket bank and the rest of the 5 are song hotkeys, as one could imagine
ygData.messageBody:
hehe my macro is "Help! kill it! kill it! HELP!!!" its the number 2 spot in
my first hot-ket bank and the rest of the 5 are song hotkeys, as one could
imagine it is pressed accidentally about 100 times more than on purpose, but
when I do need help it works rather well.

Gleeman Merrilin, Bard of the 21st Song
Officially, the boy who cried wolf
